q: "And thank God he was relieved of his duties and we put the surge in, otherwise we would have had a disastrous defeat in Iraq." Rummy writes On President Bush While the President Bush and I had many discussions about the war preparations, I do not recall his ever asking me if I thought going to war with Iraq was the right decision. On Colin Powell "The media image" of Mr Colin Powell "battling the forces of unilateralism and conservatism may have been beneficial to Colin Powell in some circles, but it did not jibe with reality."

Photo in Slideshow: Colin Powell , Walter E. Boomer BREAKING UP IS HARD TO DO...- Anastasio Somoza was a bulwark against Nazi influence in Central America. Ferdinand... Photo in Slideshow: Madeleine Albright , Colin Powell Report Abuse All of these books come out: President Bush , Feith, now Donald Rumsfeld . But NOBODY answers the one question that needs to be answered. Who gave the orders in Iraq during the early days? Specifically, who gave Order number one and order number two which disbanded both the Baath Party and the army of Iraq? These orders killed thousands of our troops and hundreds of thousands of Iraqis. Across the nation there's a feeling of defiance among politicians. They are undeterred by the violence that erupted at Gabrielle Giffords ' political event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8, 2011. I think right now she is inspiring all of us, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.). "I think she is inspiring our nation with her courage, with her strength." You have to match production to real demand and accelerate development of new products that people will want to buy, he said.
